person.persName: George L. Lovier (Christian County, Kentucky apprentice silver smith and soldier)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, apprentice silversmith and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Lovier and Elizabeth Lovier. StuHousehold owned four enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860. dent of Christian County in 1850. Apprentice silversmith in Christian County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from October 20, 1861, to June 1, 1863. Served in the 48th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from June 1, 1863, to December 17, 1864.
